mil3.3.13:1.1: '"\'“Venerable Nāgasena, what is the distinguishing characteristic of applied thought?” \'"'
mil3.3.13:1.2: '"\'“Mental fixing, your majesty, is the distinguishing characteristic of applied thought.” \'"'
mil3.3.13:2.2: '"\'“Just as, your majesty, a carpenter fixes a superbly crafted piece of wood into a join, \'"'
mil3.3.13:2.3: '"\'in the same way mental fixing is the distinguishing characteristic of applied thought.” \'"'
mil3.3.13:4.1: '"\'Distinguishing Characteristic of Applied Thought Question thirteenth \'"'
